rooms.description: Scandinavian style living area with minimalistic decor and abundant natural light due to floor-to-ceiling windows on the south facing side.
Adjacent to the living room with a focus on open-plan design and large garden view.
Modern Scandinavian kitchen with energy-efficient appliances and ample storage; features floor-to-ceiling windows for natural light.
Cozy library with built-in bookshelves and a reading nook, integrating Scandinavian design with natural wood finishes.
Guest bedroom with minimalistic decor, featuring a private balcony facing the garden for relaxation.
